name: Calcium Cannon
description:
Who is Mr Skelly? Why is he in a dungeon? What's the point of launching yourself out of a cannon if you have legs? Who made this soundtrack and why is it so catchy? 

All of these questions and more will be answered when you play the thrilling adventure of Mr Skelly... maybe.

Created for University of Plymouth Game Jam - GAD Course. 

Controls- 

'WASD' to aim cannon

'SPACE' to fire cannon 

'R' to reset 

'MOUSE' to navigate the shop
